alert.note: Alert for Harding; Perkins; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 27 at 1:27PM MST until March 01 at 5:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: .Several inches of snow are expected across far northwestern South Dakota tomorrow into tomorrow night. An initial round of accumulating snow is likely tomorrow morning, followed by a break late morning into early afternoon before heavier snow arrives. Highest accumulations are generally anticipated near the North Dakota border. Snow will mostly taper off by daybreak Wednesday. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TUESDAY TO 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Locally heavier amounts possible. * WHERE...Harding County, Perkins County and Ziebach County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Cheyenne River Reservation. * WHEN...From 5 AM Tuesday to 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
